title: PBE site is giving error
body: Why are not you giving enters pbe site ? I try to get to sign up and is always giving 500 error

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times here on the boards. The most common cause is a routing issue to the page. This can usually be bypassed by either using another network or by temporarily rerouting your connection by using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us). 

Let me know if this helped.
